name: logseq-bonofix-theme
author: Sansui233
description: A clean theme for Logseq, focusing on long time writing experience.

scripts.build: sass source/index.scss custom.css --no-source-map && npx uglifycss custom.css --output ~/Library/'Mobile Documents'/iCloud~com~logseq~logseq/Documents/logseq/custom.css

themes.name: Bonofix Theme
themes.description: A custom theme focus on UI bug fix and mobile improvement
